content: mrs eviltedi weeping angel materials grey dk yarn 3mm crochet hook a small piece of card or plastic see note below toy stuffing tapestry needle and for attacking angel a small amount of dark grey or black yarn or thread to embroider face and a pipecleaner for pose- able arms work in the amigurumi style of spirals ie do not join at end of round do not turn continue working in next stitch use a marker to denote end of rounds single_crochet single_crochet uk double double_crochet double_crochet uk treble increase increase decrease decrease blo back loops only nr next row … repeat the instructions in brackets as indicated for firm standing base of card or plastic draw around base body at 24sc as noted in pattern head starting at crown work 2 chain work 6sc into 2nd chain from hook 6sc nr -
